CancelJob.name: CancelJob
CancelJob.description: Cancel a job that Elastic Transcoder has not begun to process

ListJobsByPipeline.name: ListJobsByPipeline
ListJobsByPipeline.description: Get a list of the jobs that you assigned to a pipeline

ListJobsByStatus.name: ListJobsByStatus
ListJobsByStatus.description:
Get information about all of the jobs associated with the current AWS account that
                                                have a specified status

ListPipelines.name: ListPipelines
ListPipelines.description: Get a list of the pipelines associated with the current AWS account

ListPresets.name: ListPresets
ListPresets.description: Get a list of all presets associated with the current AWS account.

ReadJob.name: ReadJob
ReadJob.description: Get detailed information about a job

ReadPipeline.name: ReadPipeline
ReadPipeline.description: Get detailed information about a pipeline

ReadPreset.name: ReadPreset
ReadPreset.description: Get detailed information about a preset.

TestRole.name: TestRole
TestRole.description:
Test the settings for a pipeline to ensure that Elastic Transcoder can create and
                                                process jobs

UpdatePipelineNotifications.name: UpdatePipelineNotifications
UpdatePipelineNotifications.description: Update only Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) notifications for a pipeline

UpdatePipelineStatus.name: UpdatePipelineStatus
UpdatePipelineStatus.description:
Pause or reactivate a pipeline, so the pipeline stops or restarts processing jobs,
                                                update the status for the pipeline.
